channel.title: Experience changing
channel.description:
Hey, I wonder if there's a way to change how much XP you get for each hit. I changed the CombatEXP from 200 to 1, still I think it's to much. I get like 2000+ XP each 1 hit. Wich is like level 10 instantly. Is there a way to change to like 100 - 500 XP per hit instead?
Thanks in advance.
Sincerly, Dealman.
Yes I searched but found only result about changing the CombatEXP wich I already knew.

item.title: Experience changing
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

delta:

You changed the exp to 1 but you still think its too much

Once again, read please. The CombatEXP seems to be an multiplier. If I get lets say 2000XP each hit and change from 1 to 2 I get 4000xp.

But I have it on 1 and get around 1800XP each hit. I want to lower it to 100-500. Is it possible on a Silabsoft compitable source?

EDIT: Ok, I searched a bit more. And found “hitDiff * 4 = xp” in a topic. No results on it, but I found a few results with “hitDiff *”. But it only said about mageEXP.

Read full topic

item.title: Experience changing
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Yes, uh use Search it’s around here somewhere I think.

Read full topic
